text: My husband, then boyfriend, came over right after I had my wisdom teeth taken out. And of course I passed out right away on his shoulder. And he let me stay like that for an almost full 12 hours until I woke up. Later on decides to tell me he thinks he has permanent back damage from it.... he could have simply moved because due to the amount of drugs I was on I probably would have stayed asleep.. but that’s just how much he loves me lol
Does the dream of freedom not exist? There has to be one thing. Ever heard of the Grand Canyon??
